articles.title: Physicists Have Succeeded in Transforming Lead Into Gold… in a Fraction of a Second - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: Physicists at CERN's Large Hadron Collider have managed to turn lead into gold — but only for a fraction of a second. This remarkable feat involves high-speed particle collisions and a rare transformation process.
articles.content: In an extraordinary experiment at CERNs Large Hadron Collider (LHC), physicists have turned lead into gold but only for a brief moment. This feat, a modern-day form of alchemy, occurred when high-ene… [+4351 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: India and Pakistan ceasefire shaken by overnight fighting in disputed Kashmir region - NPR
articles.description: People on both sides of the Line of Control, which divides the territory, reported heavy exchanges of fire between Indian and Pakistani troops. The fighting subsided by Sunday morning.
articles.content:
ISLAMABAD A ceasefire to end the conflict between India and Pakistan was shaken by overnight border fighting in the disputed Kashmir region.
